page.title: 06Ind in & around Rowney Green
page.content: BCIRA, the British cast iron research association is the largest industry around the Rowney Green area. The company arrived at Rowney green in 1941, but the company was establlished in 1921. The company's main building and surounding buildings took up fiften acres out of 270 acres. The company has expanded since the first buildings, a new block was built in 1962 for science research into cast metals. Some people had questioned about the presence of gases and pollution, which may harm the countryside and the surrounding wildlife, produced by the chemicals etc, which may be produced by the smelting and other processes.
